thread.section_title: NewYorkDress.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of NewYorkDress.com | www.newyorkdress.com
thread.title: Donna Lerminiaux

author: Donna Lerminiaux
title: Donna Lerminiaux
text: We ordered my daughters' grad dress recently and were incredibly impressed by the fantastic service we received and at how quickly the dress arrived. We live in Canada and the dress was here just 4 days after we received the shipment notice email! The dress was exactly what was in the picture and the measurements were true to the size chart. The dress fit my daughter perfectly and will need no alterations - length was an issue since she is 6ft tall so I called to verify the length. I found the same dress at another company and asked for a price match and they matched the price and took off another 5%! I would definitely recommend this company and would order again!
